content: **knitted beret/hat in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-945 yarn group a + a or c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-100-100 g colour 2020 light nougat and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 01 off white accessories approx 56-60 cm elastic needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm for edge drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
